## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [callbackFactory(block, xml)](./blockly.contextmenu.callbackfactory.md) | Create a callback function that creates and configures a block, then places the new block next to the original. |
|  [dispose()](./blockly.contextmenu.dispose.md) | Dispose of the menu.  Blockly.ContextMenu.dispose |
|  [getCurrentBlock()](./blockly.contextmenu.getcurrentblock.md) | Gets the block the context menu is currently attached to.  The block the context menu is attached to.  Blockly.ContextMenu.getCurrentBlock |
|  [hide()](./blockly.contextmenu.hide.md) | Hide the context menu.  Blockly.ContextMenu.hide |

|  [show(e, options, rtl)](./blockly.contextmenu.show.md) | Construct the menu based on the list of options and show the menu. |
